mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dibson_list (dibson_num, users_num, users_id, space_num, dib_regdate) VALUES(dibson_list_seq.NEXTVAL, #{users_num}, #{users_id}, #{space_num}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT result2.* FROM (SELECT dibson_num, space_name, users_id, space_num, mainImagePath, addr, space_category.cate_num, space_category.cate_name, rownum as rnum FROM (SELECT dibson_num, space_name, users_id, seller_space.space_num space_num, dib_regdate, mainImagePath, addr, cate_name FROM dibson_list INNER JOIN seller_space ON dibson_list.space_num=seller_space.space_num WHERE users_id=#{users_id}) result1 INNER JOIN space_category ON result1.cate_name=space_category.cate_name) result2 WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
